overview: Prior to joining Ramius in February 2000, Mr. Wyman was a Senior Vice President at Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette in the firmâ€™s High Yield Group from 1996 to 2000, where he was responsible for trading stressed and distressed bank debt. From 1994 to 1996, Mr. Wyman was a Managing Director of MJ Whitman Senior Debt Corp., an investment management firm, where he specialized research and trading of distressed public and private securities. Mr. Wyman received his B.A. in Economics from Brown University and his J.D. from the University of Wisconsin â€“ Madison.
